title: He's Gotta Have It
itunes:title: He's Gotta Have It
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 35 year old woman dating a 41 year old man. We’ve been dating for about 5 months and we had sex a few times before we actually decided to be in a relationship. The sex was always normal, nothing out of the ordinary and after the encounter, we wouldn’t talk for a while. Now we live together and I have come to realize that this man is a straight up nympho. It doesn't matter what I'm doing, every time we're in the bedroom at the same time, he is ready to get it on. He will drop everything he's doing just to get a little something...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
